Package ca.caro.assetmanagement.database

Class DepreciationHandler

java.lang.Object
ca.caro.assetmanagement.database.DepreciationHandler
public class DepreciationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Depreciation Handler Class

Class that handles interaction of the web application to the MS Server. Contains methods for handling the Depreciation Related tables with operations such as adding, editing, and deleting depreciation as well as methods for getting depreciation info.

  • Method Details

    • getDepreciations

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDepreciations()
      This method is used to get all the the basic depreciation information. Row structure: [Depreciation Info ID]; [Depreciation Description]
      Returns:
      ArrayList of String This returns a collection of the rows in an arraylist.

    • getDepreciationInfo

      public java.lang.String getDepreciationInfo​(java.lang.String deprec_info_id)
      This method is used to get more info for a specified depreciation ID. Info structure: [Depreciation Info ID]; [Depreciation Description]; [Updated]; [Categories Applied]; [Depreciation Formula]; [Custom Mode]; [Depreciation Rate]; [Time Interval ID]
      Parameters:
      deprec_info_id - String the ID of the depreciation that information will be retrieved
      Returns:
      String This returns a compiled information delimited by ';'

    • getTimeIntervals

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTimeIntervals()
      This method is used to get all the time interval information. Row structure: [Time Interval ID]; [Time Interval Desc]
      Returns:
      ArrayList of String This returns a collection of the rows in an arraylist.

    • addDepreciation

      public boolean addDepreciation​(java.lang.String[] params)
      This method is used to attempt to add Depreciation into the database. Parameter String[] structure: [Depreciation Info ID], [Depreciation Description]
      Parameters:
      params - String[] parameters for adding a depreciation.
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if add operation is success, false adding is failed

    • deleteDepreciation

      public boolean deleteDepreciation​(java.lang.String deprec_info_id)
      This method is used to attempt to delete a Depreciation in the database.
      Parameters:
      deprec_info_id - String Depreciation ID for the depreciation to delete.
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if add operation is success, false adding is failed

    • updateDepreciationInfo

      public boolean updateDepreciationInfo​(java.lang.String[] params)
      This method is used to attempt to edit a Depreciation in the database. Parameter String[] structure: [Depreciation Info ID]; [Depreciation Description]; [Updated]; [Categories Applied]; [Depreciation Formula]; [Custom Mode]; [Depreciation Rate]; [Time Interval ID]
      Parameters:
      params - String[] parameters for editing a depreciation.
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if add operation is success, false adding is failed
